title: Unexpected error when updating
body: I haven't installed the game in a while and when I went to update the game I got an unexpected error and have gotten it multiple times.  The update stopped at 65% both times.

replies.body:
At that 65% the patcher has already started to download the new patch files. If you're getting any type of error at this point, there's a chance that your network's connection to our patching servers became unstable at some point so it couldn't grab all the patch files. Look over our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can patch up that connection.

Hit me up if you have any questions!
i have the same problem i've tryed even reinstalling the game completly for a week straghit and the game still dosnt work for me, i can send my logs if needed...
